title: Danjuma Ademola Kuti
text:
Danjuma Ademola Kuti (born June 25, 1998) is a Nigerian professional footballer who plays for Accra Hearts of Oak, a Ghana Premier League Club.


== Honors ==
Ademola was the third highest goal scorer of the UAE Pro-League with Fujairah FC with 21 goals in the 2017–2018 season.
